name: Idle Jackpot: Catch the balls!
description:
Are you ready to grow your jackpot?

Wake up and collect! Compete against your friends and compare your jackpot earnings.

HOW TO PLAY:
* Catch balls to hit "Mega Jackpot" and grow your jackpot faster!
* Hold down your finger to control your jackpot speed and catch more balls!
* Level up and strategically upgrade your jackpot, balls and pegs to earn faster!

FEATURES:
* Variety of upgrades to tinker with
* New ball exchange to unlock new balls -- each with different appearances
* Unique boosters help speed up game progression
* Cool jackpot avatars with stronger earning multipliers
* Smooth and relaxing environment

We are continuously adding updates and improvements to Idle Jackpot. Stay tuned and please leave a review!
